brief: Sets the style for rendering line endings
name: strokeCap()
description:
Sets the style for rendering line endings. These ends are either squared, extended, or rounded, each of which specified with the corresponding parameters: SQUARE, PROJECT, and ROUND. The default cap is ROUND.

To make point() appear square, use strokeCap(PROJECT). Using strokeCap(SQUARE) (no cap) causes points to become invisible.

parameters.name: graphics
parameters.description: any object of the type PGraphics
